title: "Positive Impact Health Centers Awarded Recognition for Patient-Centered HIV Care"
excerpt: "Positive Impact Health Centers has been awarded recognition by the National Committee for Quality Assurance (NCQA) as a Patient-Centered Medical Home. The agency is the only AIDS service organization in Georgia to receive this recognition."
